game.name: TowerMancer II
game.shortDescription: TowerMancer Cards is a construction-based deckbuilder in which the player defends their tower from waves of enemies while using cards to build it. The player relies on imps to gather resources and on new rooms to unlock powers and attack enemies.
game.shortDescriptionEn: TowerMancer Cards is a construction-based deckbuilder in which the player defends their tower from waves of enemies while using cards to build it. The player relies on imps to gather resources and on new rooms to unlock powers and attack enemies.
